title: How to Marry a Finnish Girl
description: All the secrets about Finland and the Finns are finally revealed in HOW TO MARRY A FINNISH GIRL: Everything You Wanted to Know about Finland that Finns Won’t Tell You. Simply buying this book guarantees that you will:- Make Out with Your First Finnish Girl in 24 Hours (or less!)- Move to Finland in a city that doesn’t contain the word “poo”- Land a Job that Makes Your Finnish In-Laws Proud- Not Only Speak Finnish Fluently, but Teach it too- Get on the Front Page of a Major Finnish Tabloid- Identify a Finn on holiday in the Canary IslandsAnd More!
author: Phil Schwarzmann
